10
11#include <string.h>
12
13#include "./vp8_rtcd.h"
14#include "vpx/vpx_integer.h"
15
16/* Copy 2 macroblocks to a buffer */
17void vp8_copy32xn_c(const unsigned char *src_ptr, int src_stride,
18 unsigned char *dst_ptr, int dst_stride, int height) {
19 int r;
20
21 for (r = 0; r < height; ++r) {
22 memcpy(dst_ptr, src_ptr, 32);
23
24 src_ptr += src_stride;
25 dst_ptr += dst_stride;
26 }
27}
